info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Iron County through 415 PM MDT... At 333 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Enoch, or 12 miles northwest of Cedar City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Iron County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
